welcome.title: Overlay Sizing Tool
welcome.description: This sizing tool helps you find your correct Overlay size.

productSelection.title: Product
productSelection.description: Select the product you want to find a size for.

circumferenceTTstandard.title: Circumference
circumferenceTTstandard.description: Measure the circumference (C) at {{distance}} from the distal end.

lengthTTstandard.title: Length
lengthTTstandard.description: Measure the length (L) from the bottom of the socket to the popliteal trim line.

circumferenceTTdistal.title: Circumference
circumferenceTTdistal.description: Measure the circumference (C) at the top of the seal.

lengthTTdistal.title: Length
lengthTTdistal.description: Measure the length (L) from the top of the seal to the popliteal trim line.

circumferenceTFstandard.title: Circumference
circumferenceTFstandard.description_metric: Measure the circumference (C) at 8 cm from the distal end.
circumferenceTFstandard.description_imperial: Measure the circumference (C) at 3.1 in from the distal end.

lengthTFstandard.title: Length
lengthTFstandard.description: Measure the length (L) from the end of the liner to the perineum.

circumferenceTFdistal.title: Circumference
circumferenceTFdistal.description: Measure the circumference (C) at {{distance}} from the top of the seal.

lengthTFdistal.title: Length
lengthTFdistal.description: Measure the length (L) from the top of the seal to the perineum.

lengthUnderlayTT.title: Length
lengthUnderlayTT.description: Measure the length (L) of the cut liner.

circumferenceUnderlayTT.title: Circumference
circumferenceUnderlayTT.description: Measure the circumference (C) at {{distance}} from the distal end.

orientation.title: Orientation
orientation.noteTitle: The orientation is based on user preference.
orientation.noteBody: Most users choose the same orientation as the side where the Overlay will be worn.

sizeTT.title: Size
sizeTT.save_description: Get your product code and fitting resources by email instantly.

sizeTF.title: Size
sizeTF.note_cushion_body: Cushion systems may require custom modifications to the Overlay. Please contact us at <bold>clinics@ethnocare.ca</bold> with your sizes and details about your suspension system.
sizeTF.save_description: Get your product code and fitting resources by email instantly.

sizeUnderlay.title: Size
sizeUnderlay.save_description: Get your product code and fitting resources by email instantly.
